ygData.subject: ebay
ygData.msgSnippet: i am so bored at work i am surfing the ebay auctions.  i think the salesmanship is hilarious, how almost all items are touted as the best and their effects
ygData.messageBody:
i am so bored at work i am surfing the ebay auctions. i think the
salesmanship is hilarious, how almost all items are touted as the best and
their effects completely exaggerated. two that just made me laugh was that
mistmoore battle drums increase songs by 30% (more like 16% by Maravana's
numbers, and widely believed to be no more than 20%) and the haste sash
increasing attack speed by 30% (more like 15%, the best warrior sword in the
game off Innoruuk is 30%). anyway, just a comment.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L35 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server
